mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cas_showexh ( PERFORM_CODE, TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, PLACE_NAME, PLAY_TIME, AGE, PLAN_COMPANY, INQUIRY_PHONE, INQUIRY_EMAIL, TICKET_INFO, DISCOUNT_INFO, DISCOUNT_CHARGED, GENRE_NAME, ISOPEN, FILE_URL_MI, FILE_URL_TI, INFO, service_tag, regDate, editDate ) VALUES ( #{PERFORM_CODE}, #{TITLE}, #{START_DATE}, #{END_DATE}, #{PLACE_NAME}, #{PLAY_TIME}, #{AGE}, #{PLAN_COMPANY}, #{INQUIRY_PHONE}, #{INQUIRY_EMAIL}, #{TICKET_INFO}, #{DISCOUNT_INFO}, #{DISCOUNT_CHARGED}, #{GENRE_NAME}, #{ISOPEN}, #{FILE_URL_MI}, #{FILE_URL_TI}, #{INFO}, 'ShowExh', now(), now() );
mapper.update: UPDATE cas_showexh SET PERFORM_CODE = #{PERFORM_CODE}, TITLE = #{TITLE}, START_DATE = #{START_DATE}, END_DATE = #{END_DATE}, PLACE_NAME = #{PLACE_NAME}, PLAY_TIME = #{PLAY_TIME}, AGE = #{AGE}, PLAN_COMPANY = #{PLAN_COMPANY}, INQUIRY_PHONE = #{INQUIRY_PHONE}, INQUIRY_EMAIL = #{INQUIRY_EMAIL}, TICKET_INFO = #{TICKET_INFO}, DISCOUNT_INFO = #{DISCOUNT_INFO}, DISCOUNT_CHARGED = #{DISCOUNT_CHARGED}, GENRE_NAME = #{GENRE_NAME}, ISOPEN = #{ISOPEN}, FILE_URL_MI = #{FILE_URL_MI}, FILE_URL_TI = #{FILE_URL_TI}, INFO = #{INFO}, editDate = now() WHERE PERFORM_CODE=#{PERFORM_CODE} AND START_DATE=#{START_DATE};
